The chunk defines the initialization method for the `DirectWaitBar` class, which inherits from `DirectFrame`, and sets up default options for creating a customizable progress bar widget in Panda3D. This includes defining properties like frame size, range, value, border width, color, texture, and relief style to control the appearance and behavior of the progress bar.

        # - A foreground text Node (pass in text string or Onscreen Text)
